aboutMe.para: Hello! It‚Äôs TangMo from Thailand, living far from home. The name literally translates to ‚Äúwatermelon‚Äù. I‚Äôd be happy to chat about stuff from tech, photography, to daily dose of furry memes. I spend a lot of time on VRChat, usually as the default ‚ÄúAnemo‚Äù avatar (pictured). See ya around!
